page.title: 09Home Life
page.content: cont. {10.40am.}The next thing he must do is check the corn and other things include fences and gates to make sure nothing can escape. {11.00am.}Goes back to the farmhouse for a coffee break. {11.20am.}He then goes outside and either sows a field or harvests or ploughs it,according to the season. {1.00pm.}Goes back to the farmhouse for dinner. {1.30pm.}Carrys on with the field or sends someone else to go and finish it off. {5.00pm.}Back to the farmhouse for tea. {5.30pm.}Feeds sheep and cattle and once again checks gates and fences.
